snippet: ROSS--Martin, on April 8, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Harriet. Dear father of Lillian, Suzanne (Rossi), and Matthew. Proud grandfather of Andrew, Harriet, Francis and David and great-grandfather of Charlotte. Funeral Service Monday, 11:30am at "The Riverside", Amsterdam Avenue and 76th Street. "Let it be said I was an honest man." 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSS--Martin, on April 8, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Harriet. Dear father of Lillian, Suzanne (Rossi), and Matthew.
